feature: Compatible with standard all 1/4" Screw DSLR cameras up to 2.5lbs
Light weight, but Heavy duty, Mounted cameras are firm and do not slip or fall.
Used as a stand or on the go, can be adjusted to all sides up/down left or right.
Compatible with standard all 1/4" Screw DSLR cameras up to 2.5lbs
Light weight, but Heavy duty, Mounted cameras are firm and do not slip or fall.
Used as a stand or on the go, can be adjusted to all sides up/down left or right.
Firm grip matches the hand fingers when used while vlogging outdoors on the go.
Stable and not shaky with rubber pads on its 3 legs and top mount.
